messages.subject: Holt Books
messages.msgSnippet: Well, I picked up my Teach Your Own today. I had planned to get another one of the ones suggested. Wont you know it B & N did not have any, not even the
messages.messageBody:
Well, I picked up my "Teach Your Own" today.

I had planned to get another one of the ones suggested. Wont you know it B &
N did not have any, not even the extra teach your own that I had asked that
they get. Gesh!

So I placed another order and will wait the two weeks (they say 3-5 but its
been almost 2 weeks a couple times now).

When I came home I looked at my receipt and was thrilled and guilt ridden at
the same time. The lady at the capachino stand (mind blank on the name of the
coffee) took the
on-hold paper off my book but never scanned it! Could be me but I thought
there was something strange about the transaction.
Was this an accident?
Did we look poor? (My kids are very well dressed, I am in jeans and sneakers
but they are clean and always a Polo) I don't think so.
Did she know we where HS/Unschoolers? Was she Homeschooled?
Does she hate her job?
Did she just miss it?
My gosh I am driving my self nuts. I keep thinking when we left the store we
could have been accused of shoplifting. UGH!
"ATTENTION B & N CUSTOMERS"
"Homeschool Mother lifts book at B & N while shopping with her three
children"

I am not going back there tomorrow but when my other book come in I will give
them the money.
Strange thing is my husband came home and told me his cruel boss is doing pay
cuts on the bonus program again to the toll of -1000.00 a month.

Coincidence? Do do Do do Do do Do do (twilight song)

Laura D
Who is rambling to a computer on a Friday night, while others may be deleting
their history trail ; ) deleting sounds like more fun.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
